text: The water level in the Mettur dam stood at 69.82 feet on Monday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 32.547 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The inflow into the dam was 125 cusecs and about 2,000 cusecs of water is being discharged for farm activities in Delta districts, PWD sources said.
title: Mettur Dam level
